'''Crustle''' ([[List of Japanese Pokémon names|Japanese]]: '''イワパレス''' ''Iwapalace'') is a dual-type {{2t|Bug|Rock}} {{OBP|Pokémon|species}} introduced in [[Generation V]].

It [[Evolution|evolves]] from {{p|Dwebble}} starting at [[level]] 34.

==Biology==
[[File:Crustle no shell.png|thumb|left|200px|Crustle without its rock]]
Crustle is an orange Pokémon resembling an insect or crustacean. Its most distinguishing feature is its enormous shell, which resembles a cut-away block of sediment with multiple layers and strata visible. The tips of its pincers and six feet are dark gray. It has two glaring yellow eyes. Crustle possesses a straight tail that is concealed underneath its shell. It is very strong, to the point that it can carry heavy rocks for a long time, even through arid lands where it resides. It fights members of its species over territory in battles which can become very vicious. If its shell breaks during such a fight, it loses.

==In the anime==
===Major appearances===
[[File:Cilan Crustle.png|thumb|left|250px|Crustle in the {{pkmn|anime}}]]
====[[Cilan's Crustle]]====
{{an|Cilan}}'s {{p|Dwebble}} evolved into a {{TP|Cilan|Crustle}} in ''[[BW062|Crisis at Chargestone Cave!]]''.

====Other====
A Crustle appeared during the [[Vertress Conference]], under the ownership of [[Ultimo]]. It battled [[Virgil]] but was defeated by his {{p|Vaporeon}}.

===Minor appearances===
Multiple Crustle appeared in ''[[BW075|A Restoration Confrontation! Part 1]]'', under the ownership of a group of excavators in [[Twist Mountain]].

A Crustle appeared in ''[[XY086|A Legendary Photo Op!]]'', where it managed to distract {{an|Trevor}} on his way to [[Mt. Molteau]].

==Trivia==
* No other Pokémon has the same [[Egg Group]] combination as Crustle and its {{p|Dwebble|pre-evolution}}.
* Crustle represents {{wp|July}} in the [[Unova]] [[horoscope]].

===Origin===
Crustle is based on a {{wp|hermit crab}}. Its shell resembles a block of {{wp|stratum}} rather than an actual shell, though the design also seems to resemble ornately-colored hermit crab shells.

====Name origin====
Crustle may a combination of ''{{wp|Crust_(geology)|crust}}'', ''crab'', or ''crumble'', and ''mantle'' or ''castle''. It may also involve ''{{wp|crustacean}}''.

Iwapalace is a combination of 岩 ''iwa'' (rock) and ''palace''.
